readable.title: 3517124784_4b4eb62a7a
readable.content: A female batter misses a yellow ball while another player practices behind her . A female softball player hit the ball and is running towards first base . A female wearing a baseball uniform swinging a bat . A girl in a white and brown uniform swings at a softball . A woman in a brown strip is taking a swing with a baseball bat at a yellow ball , whilst another woman is waiting on the sideline .
